patterns: Can you tell me a quote to brighten up my day?
responses: Nobody got anywhere in the world by simply being content. Louis L'Amour (1908 - 1988)
Write a wise saying and your name will live forever. Anonymous
I am Chatty, your beloved chatbot.

patterns: What kind of therapy do you do?
How come you're a therapy chatbot?
responses: The main way to help you is through talk. More like the journaling technique, what happens is that you will feel lighter after ranting your problems to me.

patterns: Can I talk to a real therapist?
I need to talk to a real therapist
I want to talk to a human being
responses: Here is a list of specialists that can help you: https://static.anaf.ro/static/10/Anaf/posturi_vacante/Lista_furnizori_servicii_psihologice_autorizate.pdf
